ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 572
ygData.msgSnippet: ... frequently. ... giants on the ... I was able to trade 2 black pearls for my choker. For a while, around lvl 10 or so, I ran around SK, Rathe Mountains, and
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 6 Dec 1999, Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> Veil runs around 1k pp.
> Choker runs around 300 pp.
>
> Black pearls seem to drop from aviak avocets most
frequently.
> However I have got them from griffons and hill
giants on the
> most rare occassion.
>
> Harmonic.

I was able to trade 2 black pearls for my choker. For
a while, around lvl 10 or so, I ran around SK, Rathe
Mountains, and EK, auctioning "buying black pearls". I
would buy them at the site of the kill, and sell them
for 100pp apiece to jewelers I knew. Made a few
hundred plat that way, incredible cash at lvl 10. BTW,
100pp is the going rate for pearls on Innoruuk,
someone said they were 200 on some servers? The druids
also drop them, as do the named centaurs in SK. (I
won't hunt quest NPC's, but others do.)



Double
